title: COVID-19 Vaccine Information
description: Through disease prevention and healthy living programs, research, education, and policy, the URMC Center for Community Health & Prevention works to create environments that support healthy behaviors in the Rochester, NY area.
cleaned_text: About the Hub Finger Lakes COVID-19 Vaccine Hub These pages were originally on the Finger Lakes COVID-19 Vaccine Hub website. The goal of the Hub was to ensure the equitable, transparent, and efficient immunization of at least 70% of the adult residents of the Finger Lakes region. Trusted messengers and regional health leaders continue efforts to educate and vaccinate eligible individuals. Partners The Finger Lakes COVID-19 Vaccine Hub collaborated with health departments, health care providers and community partners in Genesee, Livingston, Monroe, Orleans, Ontario, Seneca, Wayne, Wyoming, and Yates counties. The Hub also partnered with [Common Ground Health](https://www.commongroundhealth.org/), the region's health research and planning organization, and with the [Finger Lakes COVID-19 Vaccine Task Force](https://www.commongroundhealth.org/news/articles/finger-lakes-covid-19-vaccine-task-force-launches-today), a group of 80 regional leaders that advised the Hub to help ensure equity, transparency, and efficiency in COVID-19 immunizations efforts.
